Sentencas: In order to develop a cathode for reduced-temperature solid oxide fuel cells, cermetting effect of LSCF with Pt was investigated.
Titulo: Pt-perovskite cermet cathode for reduced-temperature SOM

Sentencas: The effect of cermetting was observed.
Titulo: Pt-perovskite cermet cathode for reduced-temperature SOM

Sentencas: However, the obtained cathode activity was only an order of 0.5 S/cm(2) at 973 K.
Titulo: Pt-perovskite cermet cathode for reduced-temperature SOM

Sentencas: The activation energy at low and high LSCF/Pt ratios was smaller than that at medium LSCF/Pt ratio region.
Titulo: Pt-perovskite cermet cathode for reduced-temperature SOM

Sentencas: The cathode interfacial conductivity, sigma(E), of the very low Pt containing LSCF cermet cathode increased with increasing cathode thickness, whereas with high Pt content, sigma(E) showed optimum.
Titulo: Pt-perovskite cermet cathode for reduced-temperature SOM

Sentencas: These results suggested that Pt has both enhancing and obstructing functions.
Titulo: Pt-perovskite cermet cathode for reduced-temperature SOM

Sentencas: Based on SEM observation, the main reason of these complicated results was considered to be due to poor porosity and narrow surface area due to high electrode sintering temperature.
Titulo: Pt-perovskite cermet cathode for reduced-temperature SOM

Sentencas: Pt may enhance sintering of LSCF.
Titulo: Pt-perovskite cermet cathode for reduced-temperature SOM

Sentencas: So reduced-temperature cathode sintering should be investigated for LSCF/Pt cathode preparation.
Titulo: Pt-perovskite cermet cathode for reduced-temperature SOM
